general_advisory: In paddy crop, Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are the critical stages. In these stages water scarcity or deficit of water causes comparatively greater reduction in yields. Hence, water deficit during these stages should be avoided.

advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering and milking stages are critical. Avoid water deficit.
Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer.
Early Shoot Borer management: Irrigate the crop frequently during hot months. Timely cutting the attacked shoot at or just below the ground level ensures destruction of caterpillars.
High temperature increases water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop and avoid water stagnation for more than six hours.
High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10 liter water in the root zone.
Brinjal shoot and fruit borer management: Install pheromone traps and spray neem-based pesticide during primary stage of pest infestation.
Mulch coconut leaves 1.8 m around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime.
In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises to 30Â°C. Ensure enough water depth before introducing fingerlings in a pond.
